attributes.additional_details:
After reading the article on this page http://uk.finance.yahoo.com/news/VAT-The-stupidest-tax-UK-yahoofinanceuk-2290079500.html

I urge people to sign this petition to have VAT removed from essential expenditure such as heating your home, female sanitary products and child car seats and for it to be imposed on luxury and non-essential items instead.

It makes so much sense
